name: electron-main-app
description: A Electron application written with Typescript

scripts.build:mac:test: npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=test electron-builder --mac --config electron-builder-test.yml
scripts.build:win:test: npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=test electron-builder --x64 --win --config electron-builder-test.yml
scripts.build:mac:rc: npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=production:rc electron-builder --mac --config electron-builder-rc.yml
scripts.build:win:rc: npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=production:rc electron-builder --x64 --win --config electron-builder-rc.yml
scripts.build:mac:prod: npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --mac --config electron-builder-prod.yml
scripts.build:win:prod: npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --x64 --win --config electron-builder-prod.yml

author: GitHub
